getFieldID_Input().Description: Get a FieldID for the input field of this intrinsic.

Parameters: Allocation: Output allocation. Must match creation element type.

getKernelID().Description: Get a KernelID for this intrinsic kernel.

setInput(android.renderscript.Allocation.Description: Set the input yuv allocation, must be @B_android#renderscript#Element#U8_E@.

create(android.renderscript.RenderScript.Description: Create an intrinsic for converting YUV to RGB. Supported elements types are @B_android#renderscript#Element#U8_4_E@
create(android.renderscript.RenderScript.FullName: public static ScriptIntrinsicYuvToRGB create (RenderScript rs, Element e)

ClassDesc: Intrinsic for converting an Android YUV buffer to RGB. The input allocation should be supplied in a supported YUV format as a YUV element Allocation. The output is RGBA; the alpha channel will be set to 255.
